name: Vintage Ercol Plank Dining Table
Vintage Ercol Day Bed (Bespoke)
description: Coming soon a lovely Ercol Day Bed, please email if you would like first dibs.

name: Vintage Painted Chicken Egg Holder - SOLD
description:
The brushwork and style of this ceramic chook is very lovely.

It is in great condition with just some crazing to the glaze to report.

Measures 26cm long x 17cm wide.

£4.50 postage.

name: Set of Four Tablemats in Nasturtium
description:
This practical set of mats is a great way to brighten up the dining table. 

Featuring Nasturtium designed for Winter's Moon by Brie Harrison, the wipe clean mats are made from heat-resistant melamine (up to 145°C)  with cork backing.

They are made in the UK and are packed in a simple brown presentation box - great for gift wrapping and storage.

Each mat measures 20.5cm x 28cm

£3.50 postage.

name: Pair of Vintage Danish Ducks by Hans Bolling - SOLD
description:
These stylish teak ducks are very collectable, and would make a great addition to a collection of Danish wooden toys.

They are in good condition, though one has a tiny chip on it's beak.

Measures 9.5cm x 9.5cm

£3.50 postage.

name: Small Vintage Fabric Sausage Dog
description:
Handmade in vintage fabric these pooches have oodles of shelf appeal.

Measures 29cm nose to tail, pattern positioning may vary from image.

£3.50 postage

name: Modern Menagerie Memory Game
description:
This fab chunky matching pairs game is aged 3+ and is perfect for small hands. The bright, graphic illustrations are simple and lovely.

The game includes 24 cards which make 12 pairs, all in a sturdy easy-slide box.

Cards measure 7.5cm square.

PLEASE NOTE WE ARE TAKING ADVANCE ORDERS FOR STOCK DUE IN THE 1ST WEEK OF DEC & WILL POST THEN.

£3.50 postage.

name: Large Vintage Fabric Sausage Dog
description:
Handmade in vintage fabric these pooches have oodles of shelf appeal.

Measures 39cm nose to tail, pattern positioning may vary from image.

£3.50 postage

name: Vintage Enamel Jug - SOLD
description:
This large jug has a very simple but lovely pattern and is in great condition inside & out.

Measures 15cm diameter x 13cm high.

£3.50 postage.

name: Billy Button Dried Flowers
description:
An unexpected addition to our range, but it is based on the principle that if we have been wanting some of these for a while then chances are some of our customers have too.

These quirky flowers are firm favourites in our book as they don't need any looking after & just look consistently lovely.

They are grouped in bunches of either:
12 stems @ £12.00 each (first image)
24 stems @ £20 each (second image)

The average measurement is 3cm but there is a nice variation in size, gorgeous bright yellow colour & with long stems too.

£3.50 postage.

name: Vintage Teal Enamel Jug
description:
This gorgeous patterned jug has some signs of age so it's perfect for flowers / paintbrushes etc.

It is of Dutch origin and measures 11.5cm in diameter x 20.5cm in height.

£4.50 postage.

name: Curious Cat Doll
description:
This lovely feline features a bright graphic on linen-cotton canvas. Merry and lovable, this vintage inspired rag doll is destined to become a family heirloom, and is the perfect size for being held by small hands.

With embroidered accents on the face. The body is stuffed canvas arms, ears, and polyester fill. Back of doll has same pattern as legs. 

Measures 49cm long x 13cm wide.

£4.00 postage

name: Vintage Welsh Wool Tapestry Tablemats
description:
A set of four unused reversible place mats in a great colour palette.

The original box sadly has seen better days.

Mats measure 34cm x 24cm

£3.50 postage

name: Mr Monkey Doll
description:
This cheeky monkey features a bright graphic on linen-cotton canvas. Merry and lovable, this vintage inspired rag doll is destined to become a family heirloom, and is the perfect size for being held by small hands.

With embroidered accents on the face. The body is stuffed canvas arms, ears, and polyester fill. Back of doll has same pattern as legs. 

Measures 49cm long x 13cm wide.

£4.00 postage

name: Vintage Wooden Pull-along Duck
description:
This duck has undeniable charm and is still working!

It plays quietly and is missing paint in places but we can forgive him these imperfections.

Measures 20cm high x 12cm wide x 19cm deep.

£3.50 postage.

N.B Please note this toy was made prior to current toy safety regulations.

name: Vintage Carlton Ware Cruet Set: Prince & Princess!
description:
This very collectable cruet set was designed by Vivienne Brennan for Carlton Ware and is in great condition with stoppers in tact and no chips etc.

They are double sided so a male character features on one side & a female on the front.

£3.50 postage.

name: Vintage Carlton Ware Cruet Set: Butler & Maid! - SOLD
description:
This very collectable cruet set was designed by Vivienne Brennan for Carlton Ware and is in great condition with stoppers in tact and no chips etc.

They are double sided so a male character features on one side & a female on the front.

£3.50 postage.

name: Vintage Carlton Ware Cruet Set: Swimmers! - SOLD
description:
This very collectable cruet set was designed by Vivienne Brennan for Carlton Ware and is in great condition with stoppers in tact and no chips etc.

They are double sided so a male character features on one side & a female on the front.

£3.50 postage.

name: Vintage Woven Sledge (from £65) - SOLD
description:
The woven textile element of these traditional wooden sledges was a big attraction for us. We have one small, one big. 

The sledges have metal loops at the front for fixing a rope to, to pull little ones along, and the larger one could seat two.

They also work as an unusual bedroom seat when not needed for fun in the snow.


Small sledge measures 61cm long x 24cm deep x 26cm high. (£65)
Large sledge measures 100cm long x 38cm deep x 26cm high. (£75)


£7.50 postage

name: Vintage Peg Doll
description:
We love a peg doll, and they make very good stocking presents in our experience!

These girls are all in good condition and measure 18cm high. Price is per doll.

£3.50 postage.

options.name: Peg Doll: Blue Dress / White Apron
Peg Doll: Blue & White Spot Dress

name: Vintage Merrythought Elephant on Wheels - SOLD
description:
The scene in Dumbo where the mother is caged and swings Dumbo in her trunk singing 'Baby of Mine' had a lasting effect on me as a girl, and so this gorgeous elephant couldn't be left behind.

Made in England by Merrythought, she has a bell on her trunk and is structurally sound. Her felt saddle has some wear and discolouration and is delicate in places but overall she is in good shape for her years.

Measures 65cm long x 28cm wide x 59cm high.

£7.50 postage.

N.B Please note this toy was made prior to current toy safety regulations.

name: Vintage Wooden Owl Cruet Set
description:
This sweet pair are probably not the most practical way to season your food as their stoppers are a little wedged 'you know where' so not sure they can be removed to fill with salt & pepper, but they are very cute all the same.

Measures 8.5cm high.

£3.50 postage

name: Vintage Dala Horse - SOLD
description:
A lovely horse in good condition with slightly faded paintwork.

Measures 12.5cm long x 13.5cm high.

£3.50 postage.

name: Vintage Toy Cleaning Kit
description:
This toy set would be good for someone who likes to keep their doll's house clean and tidy. 

Originating we suspect from W. Germany it is in unused condition.

The bucket measures 6cm high and the box measures 18.5cm long.

£3.50 postage.

name: Vintage Tonka Toy Jeep - SOLD
description:
This yellow jeep has just the right amount of wear and is in a great shade of yellow.

Measures 23cm long x 9cm wide x 10cm high.

£3.50 postage.

name: Vintage Wooden Soldier Money Box - SOLD
description:
This gorgeous bright red soldier has real vintage charm. He is a good size and in good condition, though the metal flap at the bottom doesn't stay closed, but he is fine standing on a shelf looking authoritative!

Measures 29cm high x 14cm wide x 8cm deep.

£3.50 postage.

name: Vintage Gardening Diary 1955 - SOLD
description:
This unused diary has the most beautiful cover and lots of gardening advice dotted throughout.

The dates are obviously relevant to 1955, but not sure that matters & it would be a lovely present for someone to record their own gardening notes throughout the year. It is in good condition.

Measures 13cm x 9cm

£3.50 postage.

name: Vintage Bingo Spinner & Board - SOLD
description:
Coming from a family that regularly indulges in games such as 'Flap the Kipper' & 'Ring on String' at Christmas, this Bingo set was destined to be part of our Christmas offering.

The spinner is very satisfying to operate and it's good for practising numbers with little ones. The number board has a chip at one corner & ball number 32 is missing & a substitute 70 has been made, but these are all issues that can be overcome for a true Bingo fan. Bingo cards can also be printed off online for free.

£6.50 postage.

name: Vintage Carlton Ware Cruet Set: Tie & Pearls! - SOLD
description:
This very collectable cruet set was designed by Vivienne Brennan for Carlton Ware and is in great condition with stoppers in tact and no chips etc.

They are double sided so a male character features on one side & a female on the front.

£3.50 postage.

name: Vintage Carlton Ware Money Box - SOLD
description:
This very collectable money box was designed by Vivienne Brennan for Carlton Ware and is in great condition with stopper in tact and no chips etc.

£3.50 postage.

name: Pair of Vintage Carlton Ware Pepper Pots - SOLD
description:
These gorgeous pots were originally made with a ceramic salt shaker as a hat, and were from a rare range which on research appears to be called 'The Toffs'.

This pair are missing their hats, but have undeniable charm and needed to stay together we thought to keep each other company on the shelf!

The female pot has some crazing and the male pot has a chip on the underside and some discolouration round the top edge.

Measure 9.5cm high x 5cm in diameter.

£3.50 postage.

name: Vintage Toy Terrier - SOLD
description:
This soft-toy terrier was made in England and is in really good condition for it's age, with soft clean fur and lovely fluffy legs and whiskers.

Measures 18cm high x 26cm long.

£3.50 postage.

N.B Please note this toy was made prior to current toy safety regulations.

name: Vintage Bottle Opener Set - SOLD
description:
Always best not to drink alone, and not really sure these fellas count as company but you never know!

In good vintage condition, the bench measures 15cm wide x 18cm high.

£3.50 postage.

name: Vintage Soldier Tin Money Box - SOLD
description:
A lovely graphic tin to encourage good financial habits!

In good condition though does have some marks to the side & a small dent.

Measures 13cm x 13cm.

£3.50 postage

name: Pair of Vintage Decorative Coat Hangers - SOLD
description:
These beautifully illustrated hangers would be a great present for someone who likes to collect vintage clothing as they are a great way to display.

The pair are in good condition, though the plastic has yellowed in places.

Made in W. Germany they measure 38cm high x 36cm wide.

£3.50 postage.

name: Vintage Ceramic Plaque - SOLD
description:
Despite the Scandinavian style, this decorative plaque was made in Japan. The illustration style is lovely & the plaque is in great condition.

Measures 20cm x 15cm

£3.50 postage

name: Vintage Fisher Price Garage - SOLD
description:
This super-cute garage has stood the test of time and no doubt being played with very well.

It has a working life, with a satisfying bell at each level and comes with a separate ramp. The graphics are all in mostly good condition, though it has lost a corner (see pictures).

Measures 44cm wide x 38cm deep x 27cm high.

£7.50 postage.

name: Bespoke Vintage Ercol Windsor 3 seater sofa - SOLD
description:
This large blonde sofa is in wonderful condition for it's age, with minimal signs of wear to the wood.

It is priced to be made in your choice of fabric and includes a new seat interior (one long cushion) and the making of the cover, but not the fabric. (Approximately 4m-5m required depending on fabric chosen.) Please email for more information on our bespoke service.

It measures 174cm wide x 76cm deep x 79cm high.

Please note we are happy to take a deposit to secure the item for you & then ask for the balance to be paid before delivery.

We deliver across the UK. Please email with a post code if you would like a quote. Approximate cost of delivery to London is £55.

name: Vintage Wrighton Chest of Drawers
description:
In wonderful condition these drawers were made by Wrighton for Maple. They use a dark veneer on wood that is in great condition and obviously very durable, with wood handles and solid wood legs.

There are a couple of signs of wear as shown in the pictures, the top is very clean though it does have some subtle scratches that only show when the light hits, but nothing significant.

Measures 91.5cm wide x 46cm deep x 73cm high.

We deliver across the UK. Please email with a post code if you would like a quote. Approximate cost of delivery to London is £35.

name: Child's Vintage Play Seat - SOLD
description:
This very cute table & seat set is not in pristine condition, but has lots of charm.

The table flips over so is metal one-side (good for magnets) or blackboard the other. It also folds flat for storage - how convenient!

Please scrutinise the photos as it does have rust patches and areas of wear.

Measures 64cm deep x 59cm wide x 44cm high.

£7.50 postage.

name: Vintage Ladderax Shelving with Grey Ladders - SOLD
description:
We haven't had grey ladders before & they complement the warmth of the teak really well.

This tall set of shelves offers a great amount of storage, but also a really flexible way to display books, photos and pictures with the sloping shelf. 

The set is in lovely condition, with some small nicks to the metal here & there but the teak shelves are all good. Please not the shelves require fixing to the wall for stability, fixings are not provided.

Measures 93.5cm wide x 30cm deep x 205cm high.

£24.00 postage, flat-packed with a postal courier.

name: Limited Edition Vintage Pink Floral Fabric Tray
description:
These tea trays are made in Sweden using vintage fabrics from our collection.

Each tray is one of a limited number in that fabric. Some designs we have a few of, some just a couple making them rather unique as we don't have more fabric in any of the designs. Being vintage fabric, there may be the odd fleck here or there, and the pattern may sit differently to the image shown.

The trays use many layers of birchwood from the birchwood forests of northern Europe, the fabric is laminated to these layers with a durable coating that is also dishwasher safe - how practical!

Measures 36cm x 28cm.

£4.50 postage

name: Limited Edition Vintage Atomic Fabric Tray
description:
These tea trays are made in Sweden using vintage fabrics from our collection.

Each tray is one of a limited number in that fabric. Some designs we have a few of, some just a couple making them rather unique as we don't have more fabric in any of the designs. Being vintage fabric, there may be the odd fleck here or there, and the pattern may sit differently to the image shown.

The trays use many layers of birchwood from the birchwood forests of northern Europe, the fabric is laminated to these layers with a durable coating that is also dishwasher safe - how practical!

Measures 36cm x 28cm.

£4.50 postage

description:
These tea trays are made in Sweden using vintage fabrics from our collection.

Each tray is one of a limited number in that fabric. Some designs we have a few of, some just a couple making them rather unique as we don't have more fabric in any of the designs. Being vintage fabric, there may be the odd mark here or there, and the pattern may sit differently to the image shown.

The trays use many layers of birchwood from the birchwood forests of northern Europe, the fabric is laminated to these layers with a durable coating that is also dishwasher safe - how practical!

Measures 36cm x 28cm.

£4.50 postage

description:
These tea trays are made in Sweden using vintage fabrics from our collection.

Each tray is one of a limited number in that fabric. Some designs we have a few of, some just a couple making them rather unique as we don't have more fabric in any of the designs. Being vintage fabric, there may be the odd fleck here or there, and the pattern may sit differently to the image shown.

The trays use many layers of birchwood from the birchwood forests of northern Europe, the fabric is laminated to these layers with a durable coating that is also dishwasher safe - how practical!

Measures 36cm x 28cm.

£4.50 postage

name: Limited Edition Vintage Yellow Heals Fabric Tray
description:
These tea trays are made in Sweden using vintage fabrics from our collection.

Each tray is one of a limited number in that fabric. Some designs we have a few of, some just a couple making them rather unique as we don't have more fabric in any of the designs. Being vintage fabric, there may be the odd fleck here or there, and the pattern may sit differently to the image shown.

The trays use many layers of birchwood from the birchwood forests of northern Europe, the fabric is laminated to these layers with a durable coating that is also dishwasher safe - how practical!

Measures 36cm x 28cm.

£4.50 postage

name: Limited Edition Vintage Bright Dots Fabric Tray - SOLD OUT
description:
These tea trays are made in Sweden using vintage fabrics from our collection.

Each tray is one of a limited number in that fabric. Some designs we have a few of, some just a couple making them rather unique as we don't have more fabric in any of the designs. Being vintage fabric, there may be the odd fleck here or there and the pattern may sit differently to the image shown.

The trays use many layers of birchwood from the birchwood forests of northern Europe, the fabric is laminated to these layers with a durable coating that is also dishwasher safe - how practical!

Measures 36cm x 28cm.

£4.50 postage

name: Small Vintage Bamboo Mirror - SOLD
description:
This mirror has a great shape to it. The glass does have markings on it (see 2nd photo) but if the mirror is more for decoration then that's not so much of an issue.

It has one solitary hook on the back which I attached string to to hang for the photos.

Measures 49cm in diameter.

£5.50 postage.

name: Vintage Meredew Extending Teak Dining Table
description:
It was the legs that did it! We just fell for the tapered legs and quirky rounded feet on this compact dining table by Meredew.

It is a great size for a smaller space, comfortably extending to seat 6 with a really easy mechanism.

The top is a nice rich colour and there is some difference in the colour between the extension leaves and the rest of the top - which is to be expected with a table of this age. The main part of the table has some darker areas of wear (see photos) but overall it's in good condition.

Measures 103cm/145cm wide x 90cm deep x 74cm high. 

We deliver across the UK. Please email with a post code if you would like a quote. Approximate cost of delivery to London is £45.

name: Vintage Wicker Occasional Table
description:
This table has a real charm about it - the way the light hits the wicker pattern is particularly lovely.

It is in good condition structurally but has some darker areas on the wicker (see photos). Legs come off for postage.

Measures 67cm wide x 43cm deep x 54cm high.

£7.50 postage

name: Ercol Windsor Chair - SOLD
description:
This gorgeous chair has defied identification, but seems to date from 1968 and was designed by Ercol as a dining chair. It has the distinctive flippy-up arms of the 'cowhorn' chairs also of that era.

It is in lovely condition with just the odd mark here or there and would work well in a corner to add a touch of style to your room.

Measures 59cm wide x 49cm deep x 88cm high.

name: Vintage Blue Floral Cushion
description:
This fabric is a vintage Jonelle design and feels like a cotton / linen mix. The colour palette is lovely with a rich dark blue, purple, red and green.

The cushion measures 45cm square and includes a feather pad. It is backed in a complementary plain with a zip opening. Please note pattern positioning may vary.

Made to order, please allow 3 weeks for delivery.

£4.50 postage.

name: Child's Vintage Bamboo Chair - SOLD OUT
description:
These diddy yet stylish chairs are great for the corner of a child's room or play room.

At the time of listing we have two available, one has a lighter area of bamboo from a repair - both are structurally sound.

Measures 45cm wide x 45cm deep x 53cm high.

£7.50 postage.

name: Vintage Geometric Pure Wool Blanket - SOLD
description:
The colours of this blanket are really lovely together, with a surprisingly contemporary design. It was made in New Zealand and the 'Te-Ariki' range that this is from seem quite collectable from the limited information I have managed to find.

It is a gorgeous heavy-weight soft wool and has no holes or signs of age, which is remarkable.

Measures 170cm x 150cm.

£7.50 postage.

name: Vintage 3 Seater Wooden Frame Sofa (Bespoke) - SOLD
description:
This elegant sofa is really comfortable and a compact way to provide seating for three, as the arms are so slim.

It is in great condition and has new webbing and cushions. It is priced to include the making up of a new cushion covers, but not the fabric (approximately 6m) which we are happy to help source. 

It measures 153cm wide x 84cm deep x 89cm high (80cm high frame).

We deliver across the UK. Please email with a post code if you would like a quote. Approximate cost of delivery to London is £45.

name: Bespoke Vintage Ercol Windsor Armchair (pair available)
description:
We have a pair of these chairs both in beautiful condition. Price is per chair & excludes fabric (3m required) & delivery

We are happy to help source fabrics, please email for more info & other pictures. 

Measures 71cm wide x 88cm deep x 77cm high.

name: NEW! Bell Bottom Table Lamp in Grey with Higgledy Shade
description: This ceramic table lamp is handmade for us by a small family pottery company in the Stoke-on-Trent. It is the perfect partner to our range of lampshades and is wired with braided flex and metal bulbholder. The shade in Higgledy, a fabric designed in collaboration with Japanese illustrator Mihoko Seki Measures 53cm high (including shade) and 18cm wide at base. Please note lampshade is made to order, please allow 2-3 weeks for delivery. £6.50 postage

name: NEW! Bell Bottom Table Lamp in Orange with Higgledy Shade
description: This ceramic table lamp is handmade for us by a small family pottery company in the Stoke-on-Trent. It is the perfect partner to our range of lampshades and is wired with braided flex and metal bulbholder. The shade in Higgledy, a fabric designed in collaboration with Japanese illustrator Mihoko Seki Measures 53cm high (including shade) and 18cm wide at base. Please note lampshade is made to order, please allow 2-3 weeks for delivery. £6.50 postage

name: NEW! Higgledy Cushion in Blue
description: Higgledy has been designed in collaboration with Japanese illustrator Mihoko Seki. Mihoko works using a process called Katazome which is a Japanese method of dyeing fabrics using a resist paste applied through a stencil. Higgledy features cats, horses, washing lines & flowers being delivered to ladies in towers....amongst other things! Higgledy is 100% cotton & printed in the UK. The cushion cover is 45cm x 45cm, with a complementary plain on the back, zip opening and a feather pad. MADE TO ORDER - PLEASE ALLOW 3 WEEKS FOR DELIVERY. £4.50 postage.

name: NEW! Higgledy Cushion in Red
description: Higgledy has been designed in collaboration with Japanese illustrator Mihoko Seki. Mihoko works using a process called Katazome which is a Japanese method of dyeing fabrics using a resist paste applied through a stencil. Higgledy features cats, horses, washing lines & flowers being delivered to ladies in towers....amongst other things! Higgledy is 100% cotton & printed in the UK. The cushion cover is 45cm x 45cm, with a complementary plain on the back, zip opening and a feather pad. MADE TO ORDER - PLEASE ALLOW 3 WEEKS FOR DELIVERY. £4.50 postage.

name: Perky Formica Table / Desk in Yellow
description: This table is a new product, exclusive to Winter's Moon, and is a contemporary take on formica tables of the past. Made in the UK from Formica in the perfect yellow, the table has a birch ply top and bare solid European oak legs which are unfinished. Also available in grey The size was conceived to work well as a desk (I am typing this on one now very happily) or a small side or hall table. The legs unscrew for delivery & are sent with screws and allen key. It measures 108cm wide x 59cm deep x 74.5cm high. Please note there are occasionally small flecks in the Formica, this is unavoidable. Formica sample available by post - please email to request. £24 delivery via postal courier. (We are able to ship to areas of Europe for £35, please email for more information).

name: Perky Formica Table / Desk in Grey
description: Made in the UK from Formica in a pale grey, the table has a birch ply top and bare solid European oak legs which are unfinished. Also available in yellow The size was conceived to work well as a desk (I am typing this on one now very happily) or a small side or hall table. The legs unscrew for delivery & are sent with screws and allen key. It measures 108cm wide x 59cm deep x 74.5cm high. Formica sample available by post - please email to request. £24 delivery via postal courier. (We are able to ship to areas of Europe for £35, please email for more information).

name: Large Vintage Footstool in Nasturtium
description:
This large footstool is a great showcase for our linen upholstery fabric Nasturtium. It has been professionally recovered and has nice shapely legs too.

It would work well at the end of a bed or centre stage in a living room!

Measures 92cm wide x 41cm deep x 35cm high.

£9.00 postage.

name: Vintage Teak Coffee Table - SOLD
description:
This very pleasing table has no maker marked on it so it's a bit of a mystery, but has more than a hint of Danish design about it. We particularly love the way the legs taper near the top.

It is in lovely condition with a good rich colour to the wood.

Measures 51cm x 51cm x 56cm

£9.00 postage.

name: Child's Vintage Folding Desk - SOLD
description:
A sweet desk with room to store pads & pens, that can also be folded away when out of use. It is in good vintage condition with some wear to the legs and marks on the top - including the odd doodle by a previous owner.

Measures 52cm wide x 43cm deep x 70cm high.

£9.00 postage

name: Vintage Formica Table with Geometric Triangle Design - SOLD
description:
The pattern on this table is just fab - an original design by Formica.

It is in good condition, though does have some small marks to the formica (please see pics). One of the flaps does not sit as horizontally as the other, but if you wanted to leave it up it would be possible to pop something into the hinge to wedge it open so it sits more horizontally.

The legs unscrew for delivery & the table measures 60cm deep x 54cm with flaps down or 104cm with flaps up x 75.5cm high.

£14.00 delivery via postal courier.

name: Vintage Metal Fire Bucket - SOLD
description:
With just the right amount of wear, great for carrying kindling.

The interior has some sand still attached from former life!

Measures 28cm in diameter x 28cm high.

£6.50 postage.

name: Wire Desk Tray in Curry Yellow - SOLD
description:
A practical tray for paperwork in one of our favourite colours.

Two trays available at time of listing, they measure 28.5cm x 41cm long.

£4.50 postage

name: Vintage Fire Bucket - with Lid - SOLD
description:
With just the right amount of wear, and a lid - great for carrying ashes.

The interior has some sand still attached from former life!

Measures 28cm in diameter x 28cm high.

£6.50 postage.

name: Vintage Ercol Plank Dining Table & Chairs - SOLD
description:
Dated 1960, this dining set was obviously very cherished by its previous owners. It is a classic design which seats 6 with ease, without taking up acres of space.

The set consists of a plank table and 6 chairs including two carvers, all of which are in amazingly good condition. Overall the colour of the wood is lovely and any signs of age are very subtle. Some of the chair legs (see pics) have some marks and the table has one very feint patch (see pics) and a couple of small donks that were too small to show up in a photo. 


Table measures: 152cm long x 75cm wide x 71cm high.
Carver chair measures: tbc
Dining chair measures: tbc

We deliver across the UK. Please email with a post code if you would like a quote. Approximate cost of delivery to London of this item is £55.

name: Wide Vintage Metal Wall Hooks - SOLD
description:
This set of hooks is extra wide with nice bright plastic balls. The metal has odd bits of white paint here & there.

Measure 70cm wide x 15cm high.

£4.50 postage

name: Very Special Vintage Savings Tin - SOLD
description:
Who can resist a tin with a place for pennies for 'Rainy Days' and 'Sweets & Ices'...and a very assertive cat that can stand up!

The tin is in good condition, ready & waiting to be filled with pocket money.

Measures 22cm wide x 9.5cm deep.

£3.50 postage

name: Vintage Orange Floral Enamel Tea Pot - SOLD
description:
This dinky and very decorative tea pot is early Brabantia and has a nice wooden handle. It is in good condition with one small rust spot inside.

Measures 21cm wide x 12cm deep x 11.5cm high.

£4.50 postage

name: Large Vintage Brabantia Biscuit Tin - SOLD
description:
This tin can fit a LOT of biscuits! It has air-holes so best to keep them in their packets...nothing worse than a stale digestive. The carry handle means you can take it out and about if required and it also is a good shape for sitting on a shelf.

Two tins available at time of listing, both in good condition.

Measures 32.5cm long x 12cm high x 10.5cm wide.

£4.50 postage.

name: NEW! Bell Bottom Table Lamp in Orange with Vintage Blue Floral Shade
description:
This ceramic table lamp is handmade for us by a small family pottery company in the Stoke-on-Trent. 

It is the perfect partner to our range of lampshades and is wired with braided flex and metal bulbholder. The shade is a vintage linen mix fabric in a gorgeous palette of blue, mauve, red & green.

Measures 53cm high (including shade) and 18cm wide at base.

Please note lampshade is made to order, please allow 2-3 weeks for delivery.

£6.50 postage

name: Large Vintage Tin Globe
description:
Dated 1976 this globe features flags round the base which is a nice addition.

It has some signs of age in the form of tarnish and the odd dent, please see images.

It measures 31cm high x 27cm deep.

£4.50 postage

name: NEW! Bell Bottom Table Lamp in Grey with Vintage Blue Floral Shade
description:
This ceramic table lamp is handmade for us by a small family pottery company in the Stoke-on-Trent. 

It is the perfect partner to our range of lampshades and is wired with braided flex and metal bulbholder.

The shade is a vintage linen mix fabric in a gorgeous palette of blue, mauve, red & green.

Measures 53cm high (including shade) and 18cm wide at base.

Please note lampshade is made to order, please allow 2-3 weeks for delivery.

£6.50 postage

name: Large Lampshade in Vintage Yellow Heals Fabric
description:
One of our range of handmade lampshades using vintage fabrics from our collection. The design is by Heals in a palette of yellows and olive green

There is some signs of fabric age by the seam (see pic)

Measurements; 25cm tall 45cm diameter.

£6.50 postage.

name: Vintage Vase by John Clappison for Hornsea - SOLD
description:
This collectable vase is very Orla Kiely with nice subdued colours and a simple stem design....very easy on the eye!

It was made in England & is in great condition.

Measures 19.5cm high x 7.5cm in diameter.

£4.50 postage.

name: Vintage Enamel Arabia Finel Pot - SOLD
description:
This gorgeous Finel Arabia enamel stock pot designed by Seppo Mallat is a lovely simple design and in fantastic clean condition.

It is a handy compact size too, measuring 18cm in diameter & 9cm deep (excluding handles). 

£4.50 postage

name: Vintage Arkana Tulip Dining Table - SOLD
description:
This very gorgeous Tulip dining table seats four and is stamped 'Arkana' on the base. 

It is in very good condition for its age, the top has some very light scratches over the surface as to be expected but they have cleaned up well & you can only see them when the light hits if you are looking very closely. There are a couple of very small chips to the surface, but really tiny so again they don't stand out. 

The base is clean & has some scratches round the edge & a couple on the stem.

Measures 105cm wide x 73cm high.

We deliver across the UK. Please email with a post code if you would like a quote. Approximate cost of delivery to London is £45.

name: Vintage Rorstrand Picknick Dish with Lid - SOLD
description:
This ceramic dish designed by Marianne Westman states that is can be used in the oven, but it deserves to be treated with care considering it is approximately 50 years old.

There are some small brown spots on the lid and on the rim of the dish. On the underside of one of the handles there is a gap between the handle and the surface of the dish but doesn't look like there is a break on the top (see pics). But the hand painted design is good and clear which is the most important part - we especially love the artichoke design!

Measures 25cm wide x 17cm deep x 13cm high

£5.50 postage

name: Vintage Rorstrand Picknick Platter - SOLD
description:
This chunky platter was designed as a cheese board but would be much better hanging on the wall to be admired on a daily basis.

This very collectable design by Marianne Westman is good and fresh and the platter is in great condition with no signs of age.

Measures 28cm x 26cm

£5.50 postage.

name: Vintage Rorstrand Picknick Dish - SOLD
description:
This very collectable dish designed by Marianne Westman is in fantastic condition with no sign of wear to report.

The hand painted design is very modern despite it's age and still good and bright.

Measures 29.5cm wide x 22.5cm deep x 5cm high.

£5.50 postage

name: Vintage Metamec Starburst Clock - SOLD
description:
This clock was made in England and is a lovely mix of wood & copper, which would look very beautiful on a grey wall...if you have one!

It is powered by battery and seems to be keeping good time so far.

Measures 46cm in diameter.

£5.50 postage.

name: Vintage Triang Tin Truck
description:
This truck looks great from the front almost as if it has a face! It is good worn-out-enough-but-not-too-much condition with great shelf appeal.

Measures 37cm long x 13.5cm wide x 16cm high

£4.50 postage.

name: Vintage Bamboo Starburst Mirror (two sizes) - SOLD OUT
description:
The asymmetrical design of these mirrors is simply gorgeous. They are both in great condition, though the larger one has a couple of small scratches on the glass.

Large measures: 79cm wide x 61cm high
Small measures: 66cm wide x 53cm high

£9.00 postage.

name: Rectangular Cushion in Vintage Linen - Made to Order
description:
This scatter cushion measures 60x40cm, and is filled with a feather pad & coordinating plain on back with envelope opening.

Please note the pattern position may vary from cushion to cushion.

Please allow 3 weeks for made to order items.

£4.50 postage.

name: Vintage Orange Floral Storage Tin
description:
These tins have a screw top lid, which is unusual. 

Two available at time of listing, they are in good clean condition & measure 11cm wide x 14.5cm high.

£3.50 postage

name: Large Vintage French Children's Poster
description:
This large poster would make a great addition to a bedroom or playroom. 

Printed on card it measures 55cm high x 74cm wide. It is in good condition with some signs of age at the edges, please see photo.

£5.50 postage

name: Vintage Melamine Pair of Cups, Saucer & Plate in Yellow
description:
Durable but elegant, this set was made in England by Gaydon and is in a very gorgeous pale lemon. In good vintage condition.

Cup measures 9cm in diameter 6.5cm high, plate measures 17cm x 18cm

£4.50 postage.

name: Vintage Melamine Pair of Cups, Saucer & Plate in Blue
description:
Durable but elegant, this set was made in England by Gaydon and is in a very gorgeous pale blue. In good vintage condition.

Cup measures 9cm in diameter 6.5cm high, plate measures 17cm x 18cm

£4.50 postage.

name: Vintage Melamine Pair of Cups & Saucers
description:
This set was made in England by Melaware and is a great combination of teal blue & olive green. In good vintage condition.

Cup measures 8.5cm in diameter 7cm high.

£4.50 postage.

name: Vintage Footstool in Vintage Floral Linen
description:
This fabric is really glorious!  An unused heavyweight linen in green, teal & yellow with a good strong design. The stool has been professionally reupholstered and the legs are in good condition too.

Measures 60cm wide x 44cm deep x 44 cm high.

£7.50 postage

name: Set of Six Vintage Melamine Cups & Saucers in Curry Yellow
description:
Such a great colour, this style is called 'Encore' and was made in England by Gaydon.

In good vintage condition the saucers have a ring mark on the upperside from being stacked but it's not very noticeable.

Cups measure 8.5cm in diameter, 7cm high.

£4.50 postage

name: Vintage Black & Yellow Basket Chair
description:
This cute bumblebee of a basket chair is in great condition & can work in or outdoors. It is structurally sound with some subtle signs of age, but nothing significant.

Measures 67cm wide x 63cm deep x 63cm high.

£14.00 postage.

name: Large Nasturtium Pendant Lampshade *Second*
description:
At time of listing we have two pendant shades with small imperfections:
One as a thread caught under the fabric (2nd image)
One has a small dent near edge (3rd image)

Measurements; 25cm tall 45cm diameter. Please note the shades are to hang from the ceiling rather than sit on a bulbholder as shown in the image.

(Non-Second price: £66.00)

£6.50 postage.

name: Large Rectangular Cushion in Vintage Orange Floral
description:
This scatter cushion measures 60x40cm, and is filled with a feather pad & coordinating plain on back with envelope opening. 

Please note the pattern position may vary from cushion to cushion.

£4.50 postage.

name: Large Rectangular Cushion in Vintage Blue Barkcloth.
description:
This scatter cushion measures 60x40cm, and is filled with a feather pad & coordinating plain on back with envelope opening. 

Please note the pattern position may vary from cushion to cushion. 

£4.50 postage.

name: Large Rectangular Cushion in Vintage Bright Dots
description: This scatter cushion in vintage Boras fabric measures 60x40cm, and is filled with a feather pad & coordinating plain on back with envelope opening. Please note the pattern position may vary from cushion to cushion. To see matching lampshade click here Made to order - please allow 3 weeks. £5.50 postage.

name: Vintage Armchair in Blue Wool
description:
This chair is so very comfortable, the head support is in just the right place and the arms slope at just the right height.

It has been professionally upholstered in a gorgeous strong blue 100% wool woven in England. Sample available on request.

The chair measures 70cm wide x 88cm high x 78cm deep.

We deliver across the UK. Please email with a post code if you would like a quote. Approximate cost of delivery to London is £35.

name: Vintage Lloyd Loom Ottoman in Big Daisy
description:
This ottoman sits on perky legs and provides both seating and storage!

It has been professionally sprayed dark grey, then the top given a padded layer for extra comfort and upholstered in Big Daisy linen.

It measures 92cm wide x 46cm deep x 48cm high

£16.00 postage.

name: Large Lampshade in Vintage Bright Dots
description: One of our new range of handmade lampshades using vintage fabrics from our collection. The design is by Boras and features bright orange, pink and dark plum. We have more of this fabric if you wanted a pair, and they work as pendant or floor lampshades as the design has no right way up. Measurements; 25cm tall 45cm diameter. To see matching cushion click here £6.50 postage.

options.name: Large Lampshade in Vintage Bright Dots

name: Lampshade in Vintage Hyacinth Barkcloth
description:
Our range of handmade lampshades use fabrics from our collection. The shades are handmade with a rolled edge finish.

(Also available with our Bell Bottom table lamp for £130 - please email to arrange this).

Measurements; 22cm tall 30cm diameter.

£5.50 recorded post.

name: Gorgeous Graphic Vintage Occasional Table
description:
The design on this table is really striking and would make a great centre piece for a living room. The legs are metal and overall the table is in great condition with just a couple of signs of wear here & there.

It is a large table measuring113cm wide x 47cm deep x 38cm high.

We deliver across the UK. Please email with a post code if you would like a quote. Approximate cost of delivery to London is £35.

name: Vintage Cocktail Chair in Nasturtium
description:
This neat little 50's occasional chair has a shaped back which offers a very comfortable sit, and professionally upholstered in our Nasturtium linen it looks great too.

Measures 63cm wide x 83cm high x 75cm deep.

We deliver across the UK. Please email with a post code if you would like a quote. Approximate cost of delivery to London is £35.

Measures 53cm high (including shade) and 18cm wide at base.

description:

description:

It is the perfect partner to our range of lampshades and is wired with braided flex and metal bulbholder.

Measures 53cm high (including shade) and 18cm wide at base.

name: NEW! Bell Bottom Table Lamp in Grey with Vintage Black & White Shade
description:
This ceramic table lamp is handmade for us by a small family pottery company in the Stoke-on-Trent. 

It is the perfect partner to our range of lampshades and is wired with braided flex and metal bulbholder.

Measures 53cm high (including shade) and 18cm wide at base.

£6.50 postage

name: Vintage Noddy Egg Cup
description:
Little Noddy is ready & waiting to become an egg-head. Made from plastic this little chap measures 8.5cm high and 4.5cm across. 

Noddy is in good vintage condition, though suspect he is missing Big Ears. 

Two available at time of listing.

£2.50 postage

name: Vintage Teal Floor Lampbase
description:
A lovely curly-wurly lampbase, which has been painted a gorgeous teal blue. The lamp has been professionally rewired with braided flex and metal bulbholder, and pat-tested.

Measures 138cm high to bulbholder.

£14 postage, please allow 5 days for delivery.

Price excludes shade, which is available separately.

name: Large Lampshade in Vintage Barbara Brown Heals Fabric - Made to order
description:
One of our range of handmade lampshades using vintage fabrics from our collection. This shade works as a pendant or floor lamp shade as the fabric works upside down too. We also have more of this fabric if you wanted a pair.

Please allow 3 weeks for made to order items.

Measurements; 25cm tall 45cm diameter.


£6.50 postage.

name: Amazing Vintage Paper Party Pack - Railway
description:
It is tricky to showcase the potential of this pack in just a few photos, but we will do our very best. 

Dating from the 60s the pack contains a party kit for 6 children on a railway theme. Including: hats, mats, place settings, gifts and a centre piece all of which the host / hostess constructs out of the flat graphics. 

The photo of the outside of the pack shows the lists of contents, and for example the place setting is a 3d train and the centre piece is a signal box. Everything is in tact apart from a couple of elements which have already been popped out of their card template.

It is tricky to vouch for how easy or difficult the making of each piece is without deconstructing the kit, but with a bit of time & nimble fingers it looks like a fun process. Everything is in good usable condition, though back of the pack has a little wear. 

£4.50 postage.

name: Tall Vintage Teak Table Lamp Base
description:
This sculptural lamp base is in lovely condition with a warm rich colour. It has been professionally rewired with braided flex and metal bulb holder, then pat-tested.

The lamp measures 52cm to the top of the bulb holder and 10cm in diameter. It is shown with a shade 35cm in diameter & height (price excludes shade).

£5.50 postage.

name: Yellow Formica Kidney Table
description:
Based on the classic 50's shape, these handy tables use new Formica with marine plywood and vintage legs.

Measures 52cm wide x 35cm high x 34cm deep.

£5.50 postage

name: NEW! Large Rectangular Scatter Cushion in Nasturtium
description:
Nasturtium is our brand new upholstery fabric designed by the very talented Brie Harrison. The fabric is a linen mix printed in the UK.

This scatter cushion measures 60x40cm, and is filled with a feather pad & coordinating plain on back with envelope opening. The fabric is printed digitally and you do get the odd dot and small marks with digital printing, it is practically impossible to avoid this.

Please note the pattern position may vary from cushion to cushion.

Made to order - please allow 3 weeks for delivery

£4.50 postage.

name: Bespoke Small Vintage Sofa
description:
This sofa is a great compact size with a nice high back and lovely shape to the arms. We do also have a matching chair available.

The price is for the sofa to be professionally reupholstered in your choice of fabric, excluding the cost of the fabric (7m required). The images show a similar sofa we completed recently in a Designers Guild Blue Wool.

Measures 114cm wide x 80cm deep x 82cm high.

We have use a wide range of fabrics and with a little direction on colour from you can source samples for you to choose from...please email for more information. Alternatively you are welcome to source your own fabric.

We deliver across the UK. Please email with a post code if you would like a quote. Approximate cost of delivery to London is £35.

name: Vintage Occasional Chair in Mossy Green
description:
This chair has such a stunning shape, with THE perkiest legs!

It has been professionally reupholstered in a sustainable fabric made using stinging nettles.....very Tom & Barbara! 

With a firm sit, and a small footprint this chair could work just as well in a hallway or bedroom as the living room.

We have other chairs like this uncovered, so if you fancy it in a different fabric please get in touch.

It measures 70cm wide x 70cm deep x 76cm high.

We deliver across the UK. Please email with a post code if you would like a quote. Approximate cost of delivery to London is £35.

name: Nasturtium Fabric by the metre
description:
Our Nasturtium fabric is available by the metre, printed to order which usually takes approximately 6 weeks.  Though we have a small amount of stock available at the moment.

The fabric is suitable for upholstery & cushions, though needs FR treatment if used for upholstery.

It measures 137cm wide and is 88% Linen, 12% Polyamide. Vertical pattern repeat 74cm. Can be dry cleaned.

The fabric is digitally printed and some marks and flecks are unavoidable with this process.

Please email if you would like to receive a sample or have any questions.

name: Large Scatter Cushion in Nasturtium
description:
Nasturtium is our brand new upholstery fabric designed by the very talented Brie Harrison. The fabric is a linen mix printed in the UK.

This scatter cushion measures 50cm square, and is filled with a plump feather pad & coordinating plain on back with zip opening. The fabric is printed digitally and you do get the odd dot and small marks with digital printing, it is practically impossible to avoid this.

Please note the pattern position may vary from cushion to cushion.


£5.50 postage.

name: Vintage Welsh Tapestry Cushion (Blue) - Made to Order
description:
Made from a piece of vintage welsh tapestry fabric in a great palette of blues & green. 

The cushion has an envelope backing of plain grey linen and duck feather pad.

The cushion measures 36cm x 46cm.

Please allow 3 weeks for made to order items.

£5.00 postage

name: Vintage Welsh Tapestry Cushion (Red)
description:
Made from a vintage welsh blanket that was too full of holes to be used as a blanket any longer, the colours are such a lovely combination - very easy to find a home for. 

The cushion has an envelope backing of plain grey wool and duck feather pad.

The cushion measures 30cm x 40cm, and the use of pattern may vary from the cushion in the image.

£5.00 postage.

name: Vintage Welsh Tapestry Cushion (Ochre)
description:
Made from a vintage welsh fabric in a soft colour palette of grey and yellow, with an unusual geometric design.

The cushion has an envelope backing of plain grey wool and duck feather pad.

The cushion measures 30cm x 40cm.

£4.50 postage.

name: Small Lampshade in Grey & Black Vintage
description:
Our range of handmade lampshades use fabrics from our collection. The shades are handmade  with a rolled edge finish.

This design works as a table lamp shade or a pendant shade as there is no right way up....how handy! 

Measurements; 24cm tall 30cm diameter. 

£5.50 recorded post.

name: NEW! Lampshade in Nasturtium (in two sizes from £48.00)
description:
Nasturtium is our brand new fabric designed exclusively for Winter's Moon by the very talented Brie Harrison. The fabric is a linen mix printed in the UK.

The fabric is printed digitally and you do get the odd dot and small marks with digital printing, it is practically impossible to avoid this.

Available as either a pendant shade or for a floor or table lamp in two sizes:

The large lampshade measures 45cm in diameter & 25cm high. Images 1 & 2.
The small lampshade measures 30cm in diameter & 21 cm high. Images 3-5.



£6.50 postage.

name: Bespoke Vintage Wing Chair
description:
The shape of this substantial chair is fantastic, the wings make it a very comfortable place for forty winks and the rolled edge arms create a great profile.

We suspect the chair is G Plan but there are no labels to confirm.  It is ripe & ready to be given a new lease of life in a gorgeous new fabric....to be chosen by the new owner.

The current fabric is very tired, so the price is for the chair to be professionally reupholstered in your choice of fabric, excluding the cost of the fabric (4m required).

We have use a wide range of fabrics and with a little direction on colour from you can source samples for you to choose from...please email for more information.

We deliver across the UK. Please email with a post code if you would like a quote. Approximate cost of delivery to London is £35.

The chair measures 80cm wide x 97cm high x 84cm deep.

name: Vintage White Rosenthal Porcelain Teaset
description:
This would make a very lovely wedding present...don't you think? Unless you fancy it for yourself of course.

The quality of design and manufacture is obvious and the simple plain white porcelain would allow the set to work well with other patterns. In gorgeously good clean condition this is a very covetable set from a very collectable make.

The set consists of teapot, six cups and saucers and small jug.

Teapot measures 13cm in diameter & 15cm high, cup measures 9cm in diameter & 5cm high, jug measures 8.5cm high.

£9.00 postage.

name: Pegboard / Clipboard Organiser
description:
This is a new homegrown product, added to the Winter's Moon range as I have exactly the same at home & LOVE IT!

The angst of keeping school letters, invites, bills etc in an easy to remember place has been solved...in our home at least. Magnets on fridges slip, drawing pins didn't accommodate enough & were hardwork to get in & out. But this combination of good solid pegboard, hooks & bulldog clips works. 

The board measures 60cm x 90cm, and has wooden batons to hold it out from the wall to allow the hooks to go in & out. There are two picture hooks on the back for fixing to the wall & 6 bulldog clips & 6 pegboard hooks are included too. Please note the pegboard does have odd marks on the white here & there.

£9.00 postage.

name: Lampshade in Vintage Pink Seedhead
description:
This is such a lovely pretty fabric - gorgeous illustrations and colours.

The has a rolled edge finish and measures 30cm in diameter and 24cm high.

Available as a pendant or table lampshade.

Please allow 3 weeks for made to order items.

£5.50 postage.

options.name: Pendant Shade in Pink Seedhead - Made to Order

name: Vintage Wooden Girl & Boy
description:
Very sweet figures, with a choice of two pairings.  Their clothes are made of leather & the details are lovely. 

From a stock of unused vintage wooden toys, these figures were made in Poland and are in lovely condition.

The clothing details may vary slightly from the images shown.

Measure 7cm high

options.name: Pair with Girl with Blonde Hair
Pair with Girl with Brown Hair

name: Miniature Vintage Wooden Wine Set
description:
From a stock of unused vintage wooden toys made in the German Democratic republic, these sets are in lovely condition.

Includes the tray, bottle & goblets, table not included.

Tray measures 6cm in diameter, bottle measures 4cm high.

£2.50 postage.

name: Small Lollipop Lamp Shade
description:
The shades are handmade by us with a rolled edge finish and are a great way to add some colour to a corner.

Can be made as a table lamp or hanging shade, pattern layout may vary slightly from image shown. 

Measurements; 24cm tall 30cm diameter.

Please allow 3 weeks for delivery on made to order items.

£5.50 recorded post.

name: Vintage Floral Cushion
description:
This fabric is a lovely combination of vibrant red and orange flowers on a dark brown background. It is a very soft bark cloth cotton in good condition.

Cushion measures 46cm square and includes a feather pad. 

Please allow 3 weeks for made to order items.

£4.50 recorded post.

name: Big Daisy Scatter Cushion
description:
Lovely graphic linen printed in the UK.

This cushion measures 45cm square and is backed in a complementary brushed cotton with an zip opening at the back, includes good quality feather pad. You do get the odd dot and small marks with digital printing and it is practically impossible to avoid this.

Gentle handwash or dry clean. 

£4.50 recorded post.

name: Lollipop Khaki Rectangular Scatter Cushion - Made to Order
description:
We love Annabel Grey's fabric so much - we can't bear not to find a use for every little bit! Linen fabric printed in the UK.

This cushion measures 30cm x 40cm and is backed in a complementary brushed cotton with an envelope opening at the back, includes feather pad.

Gentle hand wash or dry clean.

Please allow 3 weeks.

£4.50 recorded post.

name: Vintage Midwinter Primavera Cups, Saucer & Plates
description:
This little random selection refused to be left behind. We will say straight off that it is not in perfect condition and is priced to reflect this, but it's still too lovely not to be used and admired.

Primavera was designed by Jessie Tait for Midwinter and is, understandably, a sought after design. So this could be the start of a collection for someone out there we thought? And who knows over the years lots of lonely plates and cups could be brought together to be one happy little tea-set.

The one of the cups has a slight crack at the base of the handle, but is usable, and please inspect the image of the plates. One plate has two chips and one has one chip.

Measurements: Plate 15.5cm diameter, Cup 9.5cm diameter & saucer 15cm diameter.

£6.50 postage.

name: Lampshade in Annabel Grey Cut Flowers - Made to Order
description:
Our new range of handmade lampshades using fabrics from our collection. The shades are handmade by yours truly with a rolled edge finish and are a great way to add some colour to a corner.

Can be made as a table lamp or hanging shade (please specify when ordering), pattern layout may vary slightly from image shown. 

Measurements; 24cm tall 30cm diameter.

Please allow 3 weeks for delivery

£5.50 recorded post.

name: Vintage Wooden 1 to 10 Number Puzzle
description:
What a colour combination!  These puzzles date from the seventies and you can certainly tell.

They are made from plywood and number pair measures 12cm x 6cm.
We were lucky enough to find a few of these puzzles as vintage unsold stock so the condition is great (although they may have odd marks here and there)  and we think they would make great Christmas presents.  Puzzles are unboxed and newly wrapped in cellophane.
 

£3.50 recorded post.

name: Vintage Tinplate Toy Racing Car - SOLD OUT
description:
These cars are nice and bright and look great on a shelf when not zooming across the floor, we have one No 7 car left.

They are friction toys so no batteries or keys, and are in lovely condition as they are genuine unused toyshop stock dating from the late 60's.

They come with box (pic to come) and measure 21cm long and 8cm wide.

£3.50 recorded post.

options.name: Vintage Large Red Toy Racing Car No 7

name: Vintage Wooden Gypsy Caravan Puzzle
description:
I love the colours in this puzzle and its unusual subject.  
The  homely cottage in the distance and the inevitable dogbringing up the rear along with swinging bird cage add to its charm! Five  kids in that lovely caravan though!  

The colours are particularly lovely and the puzzle is a good size and  props easily on a shelf for display.

We were lucky enough to find a few of these puzzles as vintage unsold stock so the condition is great (although they may have odd marks here and there) and we think they would make great Christmas presents.   Puzzles are unboxed and newly wrapped in cellophane.


Measurements;
20cm by 50 cm 

£4.50 recorded post.

name: Vintage Wooden Boat Puzzle
description:
We love this puzzle because it is so hard to find charming  decorative items for boys with lots of play value. We can cope with skulls,  dinosaurs and plastic but every now again I'd like something that is lovely to look at and still appealing to my boys. The colours are vibrantly vintage and there is so much going on from the seagull sitting on the lobster pot to the distant cranes in the back ground. 

When not in use the outer frame means that it  props  easily  on a shelf as a picture. The condition is great as it is unused vintage shop stock. Which also means we have more than one if you fancied giving them  as a Christmas presents.  Puzzles are unboxed and newly wrapped in cellophane.


Measurements; 20cm by 30 cm 

£3.50 recorded post.

name: Colourful House Magnets
description:
These gorgeously colourful magnets are handmade in the UK. They have been printed onto high quality coated paper and laminated for durability.

Perfect for a little playtime in the kitchen....and they look so pretty too!

The set contains 18 pieces and the door magnet measures approximately 4.5 x 9cm. The door number may vary from the one pictured.

£2.50 postage

name: Lovely Paper Lanterns
description:
We love these little paper lanterns by Jurianne Matter as they are a really easy way to bring a little magic into your home as the nights draw in (mind you they are great on a summer evening too). Send them as invitations, get-well cards, birthday greetings or as a little light in dark times. You simply write your message on the top and bottom. 

The A5 format card can easily be folded into a round party light. It fits around a high glass (diam. max 5.5cm) with a tea-light inside. It is safe and easy - it burns for hours. 

One pack contains 7 lanterns of different designs.

Free regular post in the UK.

name: Box of 3 Christmas Spiky Stars in Recycled Paper *3 FOR 2*
description:
BUY TWO BOXES & WE WILL PUT ANOTHER IN FREE.

We found the instructions for making these in an old 50's book on paper Christmas decorations. 

They are handmade, exclusive to Winter's Moon and measure approximately 8cm in diameter.

The stars have hangers and are boxed to preserve them for use year after year, and are suitable for indoor use only.

FREE postage in the UK

The wreaths measure approximately 40cm in diameter. They have hangers and are boxed to preserve them for use year after year. Suitable for indoor use only.

name: Lovely Paper Angels
description:
We love these little angels! They can stand or hang with a string through their wings and are printed in a really lovely colour palette.

These press-out angels come as flat cards A5 size (14.8x21cm) 
A folded angel is approximately 6.5cm in diameter 

Each pack contains seven angel cards (each with a different printed design).

Free  post in UK.

name: Welsh Wool Scatter
description:
This scatter cushion is made from a batch of vintage welsh wool that we were fortunate to stumble across. It's a gorgeous mix of turquoise and soft greens 

It measures 45cm square and is backed in a plain 100% wool with zip opening.


£4.50 postage
